title: The Inquisition; Religious Persecution - Collection 8
description:
The Inquisition; Religious Persecution - Collection 8:

We have 28 titles here:

-  Aposoles & Ablgren - The Inquisition of Francisca; a Sixteenth-Century Visionary on Trial (2005)

-  Audisio - The Waldensian Dissent; Persecution and Survival, c. 1170-c. 1570 (1999)

-  Baer - A History of the Jews in Christian Spain; Vol. I, from the Age of Reconquest to the Fourteenth Century (2001)

-  Baer - A History of the Jews in Christian Spain; Vol. II, from the Fourteenth Century to the Expulsion (2001)

-  Caravale - Forbidden Prayer; Church Censorship and Devotional Literature in Renaissance Italy (2011)

-  Carr - Blood and Faith; the Purging of Muslim Spain (2009)

-  Forrest - The Detection of Heresy in Late Medieval England (2005)

-  Garcia-Arenal & Wiegers (Eds.) - The Expulsion of the Moriscos from Spain; a Mediterranean Diaspora (2014)

-  Givens - Judging Maria De Macedo; a Female Visionary and the Inquisition in Early Modern Portugal (2011)

-  Harris - From Muslim to Christian Granada; Inventing a City's Past in Early Modern Spain (2007)

-  Harvey - Muslims in Spain, 1500 to 1614 (2005)

-  Hunter - Heresy in Transition; Transforming Ideas of Heresy in Medieval and Early Modem Europe (2005)

-  Kamen - The Spanish Inquisition; a Historical Revision (2014)

-  Lea - A History of the Inquisition of the Middle Ages, Vol. 1 (1888, 2010)

-  Lea - A History of the Inquisition of the Middle Ages, Vol. 2 (1888, 2010)

-  Lea - A History of the Inquisition of the Middle Ages, Vol. 3 (1888, 2010)

-  Matthews & Stewart - Warriors of Christendom; Charlemagne - El Cid - Barbarossa - Richard Lionheart (1988)

-  Mayer - The Roman Inquisition; a Papal Bureaucracy and its Laws in the Age of Galileo (2013)

-  McGlynn - Kill Them All; Cathars and Carnage in the Albigensian Crusade (2015)

-  Monter - Frontiers of Heresy; the Spanish Inquisition form Basque Lands to Sicily (1990)

-  Mulsow & Popkin (Eds.) - Secret Conversions to Judaism in Early Modern Europe (2004)

-  Murphy - Conscience and Community; Revisiting Toleration and Religious Dissent in Early Modern England and America (2001)

-  Norton - In the  Devil's Snare; the Salem Witchcraft Crisis of 1692 (2012)

-  O'Shea - The Friar of Carcassonne; Revolt Against the Inquisition in the Last Days of the Cathars (2011)

-  Pavlac - Witch Hunts in the Western World; Persecution and Punishment from the Inquisition Through the Salem Trials (2009)

-  Rahn - Crusade Against the Grail; the Struggle between the Cathars, the Templars, and the Church of Rome (2006)

-  Roth - Conversos, Inquisition, and the Expulsion of the Jews from Spain (2002)

-  Sullivan - The Inner Lives of Medieval Inquisitors (2011)
